# nexus-stacked-bar-chart



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property             | Attribute               | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                     | Type                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | Default         |
| -------------------- | ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------- |
| `attrId`             | `attr-id`               | Chart unique Identifier                                                                                                                                                                                                         | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `''`            |
| `axisLabelFontSize`  | `axis-label-font-size`  | label font size                                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `14`            |
| `axisTickFontFamily` | `axis-tick-font-family` | Tick font family. Valid values are 'interstate', 'sans', 'serif' and 'monospace'.                                                                                                                                               | `"interstate" \| "monospace" \| "sans" \| "serif"`                                                                                                                                                                   | `'interstate'`  |
| `axisTickFontSize`   | `axis-tick-font-size`   | Tick font size. Valid values are 8, 9, 10, 12.                                                                                                                                                                                  | `10 \| 12 \| 8 \| 9`                                                                                                                                                                                                 | `undefined`     |
| `barStroke`          | `bar-stroke`            | The Prop 'barStroke' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'stroke' Prop.                                                                                                                                                               | `"black" \| "gray" \| "transparent" \| "white"`                                                                                                                                                                      | `undefined`     |
| `barStrokeWidth`     | `bar-stroke-width`      | The Prop 'barStrokeWidth' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'strokeWidth' Prop.                                                                                                                                                     | `1 \| 2 \| 5`                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined`     |
| `canvasHeight`       | `canvas-height`         | Chart color scheme. Uses <a href="https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic">d3-scale-chromatic</a> themes.                                                                                                                      | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `canvasWidth`        | `canvas-width`          | The Prop 'canvasWidth' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'width' Prop.                                                                                                                                                              | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `chartData`          | --                      | The Prop 'chartData' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'data' Prop.                                                                                                                                                                 | `NexusStackedBarChartProps`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `[]`            |
| `chartId`            | `chart-id`              | The Prop 'chartId' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'attrId' Prop.                                                                                                                                                                 | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `colorScheme`        | `color-scheme`          | Chart color scheme. Valid values are 'category10', 'accent', "paired", 'set1', 'set2', 'set3', 'black' and 'gray'.                                                                                                              | `"accent" \| "black" \| "category10" \| "dark2" \| "gray" \| "paired" \| "pastel1" \| "pastel2" \| "set1" \| "set2" \| "set3" \| "tableau10"`                                                                        | `'category10'`  |
| `data`               | --                      | Nexus stacked bar chart props                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `NexusStackedBarChartProps`                                                                                                                                                                                          | `[]`            |
| `gridlines`          | `gridlines`             | Show/Hide grid lines. Default value is 'false'.                                                                                                                                                                                 | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `height`             | `height`                | Canvas Height                                                                                                                                                                                                                   | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `hideXAxis`          | `hide-x-axis`           | Hide X-Axis. Default value is 'false'.                                                                                                                                                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `hideXTicks`         | `hide-x-ticks`          | Hide X-Ticks. Default value is 'false'.                                                                                                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `hideYAxis`          | `hide-y-axis`           | Hide Y-Axis. Default value is 'false'.                                                                                                                                                                                          | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `hideYTicks`         | `hide-y-ticks`          | Hide X-Ticks. Default value is 'false'.                                                                                                                                                                                         | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `inverse`            | `inverse`               | Invert background colors. Default value is 'false'                                                                                                                                                                              | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `false`         |
| `legend`             | `legend`                | Show/Hide legend. Default value is 'true'.                                                                                                                                                                                      | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `true`          |
| `legendFontSize`     | `legend-font-size`      | Set legend font size. Default value is 12, Valid values are 10, 14                                                                                                                                                              | `10 \| 12 \| 14`                                                                                                                                                                                                     | `undefined`     |
| `legendMetric`       | `legend-metric`         | Set legend metric string to key from your data set. For example: dataSet = [{ make: 'Volkswagen', model: 'ID4', year: '2020', }]  Then legendMetric = 'make'.                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `legendWidth`        | `legend-width`          | Set legend width.                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `linearDomain`       | `linear-domain`         | Set linear domain. Default value is 'absolute'. Valid values are 'absolute' and 'percentage'.                                                                                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `'absolute'`    |
| `linearFormat`       | `linear-format`         | Set linear tick format. Valid values are 'USD', 'localestring', 'localestring1d', 'localestring2d', 'percent', 'percent1d', 'percent2d', 'YYYY', 'M/D/YYYY', 'M/D/YY', 'MM/DD/YYYY', 'MM YYYY', 'MMM D, YYYY', 'ISODATE', 'raw' | `"ISODATE" \| "M/D/YY" \| "M/D/YYYY" \| "MM YYYY" \| "MM/DD/YYYY" \| "MMM D, YYYY" \| "USD" \| "YYYY" \| "localestring" \| "localestring1d" \| "localestring2d" \| "percent" \| "percent1d" \| "percent2d" \| "raw"` | `undefined`     |
| `linearMetric`       | `linear-metric`         | Set linear metric string to key from your data set. For example: dataSet = [{ make: 'Volkswagen', model: 'ID4', year: '2020', }]  Then linearMetric = 'make'.                                                                   | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `linearTickFormat`   | `linear-tick-format`    | The Prop 'linearTickFormat' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'linearFormat' Prop.                                                                                                                                                  | `"ISODATE" \| "M/D/YY" \| "M/D/YYYY" \| "MM YYYY" \| "MM/DD/YYYY" \| "MMM D, YYYY" \| "USD" \| "YYYY" \| "localestring" \| "localestring1d" \| "localestring2d" \| "percent" \| "percent1d" \| "percent2d" \| "raw"` | `undefined`     |
| `marginBottom`       | `margin-bottom`         | Canvas margin bottom offset. Default value is 25.                                                                                                                                                                               | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `25`            |
| `marginLeft`         | `margin-left`           | Canvas margin left offset. Default value is 25.                                                                                                                                                                                 | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `25`            |
| `marginRight`        | `margin-right`          | Canvas margin right offset. Default value is 25.                                                                                                                                                                                | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `25`            |
| `marginTop`          | `margin-top`            | Canvas margin top offset. Default value is 25.                                                                                                                                                                                  | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `25`            |
| `maxBarWidth`        | `max-bar-width`         | Maximum Bar width. Default value is 75.                                                                                                                                                                                         | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `75`            |
| `ordinalMetric`      | `ordinal-metric`        | The Prop 'ordinalMetric' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'valueMetric' Prop.                                                                                                                                                      | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `orientation`        | `orientation`           | Orientation of the graph. Default value is 'vertical'. Valid values are 'horizontal' and 'vertical'.                                                                                                                            | `"horizontal" \| "vertical"`                                                                                                                                                                                         | `'vertical'`    |
| `seriesMetric`       | `series-metric`         | The Prop 'seriesMetric' is deprecated. Kindly use the 'legendMetric' Prop.                                                                                                                                                      | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `stroke`             | `stroke`                | Bar edge color. Valid values are 'transparent', 'black', 'white' and 'gray'.                                                                                                                                                    | `"black" \| "gray" \| "transparent" \| "white"`                                                                                                                                                                      | `'transparent'` |
| `strokeWidth`        | `stroke-width`          | Bar stroke width. Valid values are 'none', 1, 2 and 5.                                                                                                                                                                          | `1 \| 2 \| 5`                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `undefined`     |
| `tooltips`           | `tooltips`              | Should show/hide tooltips. Default value is 'true'.                                                                                                                                                                             | `boolean`                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `true`          |
| `valueMetric`        | `value-metric`          | Set value metric string to key from your data set. For example: dataSet = [{ make: 'Volkswagen', model: 'ID4', year: '2020', }]  Then valueMetric = 'make'.                                                                     | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `'label'`       |
| `width`              | `width`                 | Canvas Width                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `xLabel`             | `x-label`               | Label on x-axis. Default value is ''.                                                                                                                                                                                           | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `''`            |
| `xTickSize`          | `x-tick-size`           | X-axis tick size.                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |
| `yLabel`             | `y-label`               | Label on y-axis. Default value is ''.                                                                                                                                                                                           | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `''`            |
| `yTickSize`          | `y-tick-size`           | Y-axis tick size.                                                                                                                                                                                                               | `number`                                                                                                                                                                                                             | `undefined`     |


## Events

| Event                        | Description                                                               | Type               |
| ---------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `nexusStackedBarChartLoaded` | On load even on loading stacked bar chart ('nexusStackedBarChartLoaded'). | `CustomEvent<any>` |
